Plot: Three high school teenagers are terrorized by an older bully during what was supposed to be a night of fun. Hell-bent on making them suffer, there may be more to the bully's motivations than he lets on to.
Title: Tough Guy
Writer: Jordan Londe, Mike Maguire, Mike Maguire (story)
Actors: Jarrod Bailey, Christopher Karl Johnson, Taylor Kowald, Travis Lindquist
